Description: Lip and wall sherd of East Greek pottery bowl;-shaped cup interior black with added red and white stripes; exterior: painted band at top of lip; lower wall glazed; inscription cut on exterior, in reserved zone.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 305)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 669, no. 266)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.373)
